TF056581-PHRD-PANAMA: WATER SUPPLY AND

abstracts.cdata!:
This aide memoire summarizes the
            findings, recommendations and agreements reached during the
            mission of the Water and Sanitation in Panama Project (P
            ASAP). This memory aid will be disclosed publicly once the
            mission is accomplished. The Project Development Objective
            (PDO) was to increase access to sustainable water supply and
            sanitation in the communities involved. The specific
            objectives are to: l) Enable participating households and
            communities in poor rural and urban areas to access water
            and sanitation services through innovative approaches to
            provide services on a sustainable basis; 2) initiate a
            political dialogue under the leadership of MINSA and the
            generation and the knowledge base for decision making based
            on the evidence of the long-term goal of creating strong
            institutions and better focus on beneficiaries and greater
            coordination between interested parties; 3) improve
            sanitation and hygiene practices.
